channel.title: carving on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in carving on Praveen Lobo

item.title: An Anonymous Halloween
item.description: Tombstone and eyeballs cupcakes It was that time of the year again when the pumpkins are carved, people get costumed, and walk around downtown, of course, showing off. Guess what I did different this time - I carved a pumpkin! The family I was with loves cars so I thought of carving a Mustang (they own one). I made a sketch of it from a picture I had taken of their car, but decided not to do it as it’d be difficult and was probably going to take more time.
